note.p: Education: King's Lynn Grammar School; Trinity College, University of Cambridge (1815-1822); tutored at Trinity by John Brass and John Hudson; wrote an anonymous account of life at University of Cambridge as a guide for students and parents
Career: Chaplain to the Duke of Cambridge; dedicated his career as a writer and private tutor to helping students succeed at university
Notes: PL 30 November 1855 listed as a defaulter.
